true.prompt: It's a warm summer afternoon. You are cruising down the road to meet your friends at the beach for a picnic. You are 20 minutes late so you speed up a little. Then BAMMM!!! A body flies up in the air and slams back onto the ground. What do you do?
outcomes: You panic and continue driving. You know it was the wrong thing to do. You call your father. RING RING. 'Dad? It's me. I've made a mistake.' 'Don't worry, I will take care of it.'
'OMG! Are you okay??' The old lady you hit is groaning on the ground. 'I will call 911.'

true.prompt: You have found yourself in some trouble. Your family doesn't want you to ruin their family's name. They offer to send you to a 'camp' to keep you out of trouble for a little.
outcomes: You find yourself in more trouble at the camp. You family has been getting you out of trouble all of your life, but they cant help with this one.
Your family decides to take away some of your trust fund since you dont want their help.

false.prompt: As you are walking, you see a lottery ticket with a note attached, it reads 'its your lucky day.you have until 5pm to cash this ticket.' It is 4:58
options: run to the store in your busted shoes and try to cash the ticket in time
don't bother, you have to make it home in time for a very important meeting about a raise.
outcomes: Life has been beating you up since birth. Any good thing that has happened to you has been because of your strength and will. That changed today. You won a lot of money, although you now have a sprained ankle from running
Played it safe and took a small raise. You should have cashed that ticket
